Package org.aeonium.fxunit

The aeFXUnit test framework.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssertFX
    Assertions for JavaFX UI testing.
    DriverApp
    This application is used to initialize the JavaFX framework.
    FXHelper
    A helper class for UI testing.
    FXUnit
    Main class of the framework, provides only the static initializer method.
    FXUnitApp
    Dummy Application, only for JavaFX framework initialization.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FXUnitException
    Exception for aeFXUnit problems that may occur anywhere or in overridden methods that cannot declare an exception.

Package org.aeonium.fxunit Description

The aeFXUnit test framework.
